messages.subject: Unschooling Website
messages.msgSnippet: I am continuously compiling a link database portal on 3 pages relating to unschooling. This is to help people understand unschooling, find info and people.
messages.messageBody:
I am continuously compiling a link database portal on 3 pages
relating to unschooling. This is to help people understand
unschooling, find info and people.

main link page for news, info, organizations, essays
www.geocities.com/moonwindstarsky/unschooling

page for books, contacting people, groups, forums, wikis, magazines
www.geocities.com/moonwindstarsky/unschoolingbooks

page for views on school/unschooling, lifestyles, ideas
www.geocities.com/moonwindstarsky/lifestyle
